thread.title: Kristin Billger
thread.title_full: American Freight Furniture & Mattress reviewed by Kristin Billger

author: Kristin Billger
title: Kristin Billger
text: I had never been to American Freight however, will definitely be visiting them for any future furniture purchases. As soon as I walked in the warehouse an employee (Sonny) greeted me at the door immediately. I had a list of couches I wanted to see from the website and he took over from there. Very very helpful in helping me to choose the right piece of furniture within my price range and helping me choose the material that best met my needs, all without being a pushy salesman. The delivery men were at my door that evening as planned and were very professional. They even helped me arrange the couch and love seat however I needed them. Absolutely recommend American Freight Furniture and Mattress to anyone furniture shopping!
